title: How can i remove bootloader on my Pixel 2 XL
content:
I bought a pixel 2 XL (not brand new),
I found that the bootloader is unlocked, On my play store it says my device is not certified by play protect.
I wanted to know if this is because the bootloader is unlocked, if that's the case how can I relock bootloader because I can't download Netflix or even when I downloaded the app I can't watch anything because it says the device is not supported.
